questions.question: Are you comfortable with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics?
Have you built a frontend using React, Angular, or Vue?
Do you understand component state and props?
Have you worked with APIs from the frontend?
Do you know how browser rendering works (DOM, CSSOM)?
Have you implemented authentication flows on the frontend?
Do you understand responsive design principles?
Have you used any state management library (Redux, Zustand)?
Have you deployed a frontend application?
